name: Dr. Aswathi N
qual: Masters in Dietetics and Food Science Management
description: Holding a masters degree in dietetics and food science management, a bachelors degree in
Naturopathy and Yogic Science and being an acupuncture physician, Dr. Aswathi N integrates nutritional science,
naturopathic principles and acupuncture techniques to offer personalized holistic healthcare solutions.

name: Nelson Joy
qual: Master of Physiotherapy, Musculoskeletal and Sports
description: Mr. Nelson Joy is an MPT graduate specializing in musculoskeletal (MSK) and sports physiotherapy,
with diverse experience in stroke rehabilitation, pediatrics, sports injuries, orthopedic conditions, and geriatrics.
His expertise spans injury management, rehabilitation, and functional recovery across different age groups and conditions.
Committed to evidence-based practice, he strives to enhance mobility, independence, and overall well-being for our patients.

name: Betsy Prasad
experience: Retd. Regional Director of Pharmacy Operations, Red River Co-op, Winnipeg, Canada.
